name: A successful game developer
description:
A successful game developer is a game made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 1, my first entry to a Game JAM!

In this game your goal is to become a successful game developer, to do so you are able to pick a card from 3 options presented to you. Each card will have an effect ton your success, happiness and energy.

  • WIN condition: Success of 100%
  • LOSE condition: Happiness 0%
  • LOSE condition: Energy 0%

The current version of the game let's you enjoy videos in Youtube or watch Twitch streams to improve your happiness, find a job to survive (from a normal random job to a job in the game industry) and even work on your own game prototypes. But don't forget to sleep!

 How long did you survive? How many days did it take you to become a successful game developer? Share your results!

@alexito4 https://alejandromp.com/
